content: Despite the challenging environment of our overall ROI, which is revenue for our recommendation services, marketing and other services divided by the corresponding cost of acquisition and the promotion, improved year-over-year by 14 percentage points in the fourth quarter and 9 percentage points in the full year of 2022. For the full year 2022, total revenues from recommendation services increased by 27.2% to RMB731.7 million, with revenue from credit card and loan recommendation services increasing by 16.2% and 54.1% year-over-year, respectively. On a full year basis, revenue from big data and system-based risk management services decreased by 25.7% year-over-year to RMB96.9 million in 2022. Revenues from working several â revenues from marketing and other services decreased by 11.9% to RMB48 million in the fourth quarter of 2022 from RMB54.5 million in the same period of 2021, primarily because certain new business initiatives were negatively impacted during the COVID outbreak. For the full year, however, revenues from other â marketing and other services increased by 62% year-over-year to RMB161 million due to growth in our insurance brokerage services and other new business initiatives. Measured as a percentage of total revenue, our total sales and marketing and R&D and G&A expenses stood at 33% in the fourth quarter and 35.5% for the full year 2022 compared with 39.3% and 51.4% in the same period of 2021, which represents a decrease of about 6 percentage points and 16 percentage points, respectively.
